articles.title: US federal alert warns of the discovery of malicious cyber tools - The Guardian
articles.description: Cybersecurity officials said the evidence suggests Russia is behind the tools – configured to target North American energy concerns
articles.content: Multiple US government agencies issued a joint alert Wednesday warning of the discovery of malicious cyber tools created by unnamed advanced threat actors that they said were capable of gaining full … [+3943 chars]

articles.title: MLSE's Larry Tanenbaum joins bid from Boston Celtics owner to buy soccer club Chelsea - CBC.ca
articles.description: American investor and Boston Celtics owner Stephen Pagliuca says Maple Leaf Sports and Entertainment chairman Larry Tanenbaum and former Chelsea captain John Terry have joined his bid to purchase the Premier League club.
